meanings.definition: Belemnites: extinct marine cephalopods with a bullet-shaped internal shell.
meanings.sent1: The scientist found belemnites fossils near the shore.
meanings.sent2: Belemnites are ancient sea creatures that lived long ago.
meanings.sent3: The belemnites at the museum looked like tiny squids in armor.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of belemnites was a window to the past.
meanings.sent5: The belemnites in the rock were perfectly preserved.

meanings.definition: Belemnites: a fossilized remains of a belemnite.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a belemnites fossil found in the desert.
meanings.sent2: She studied the belemnites carefully to learn about ancient life.
meanings.sent3: The belemnites fossil was so old, it seemed to whisper secrets.
meanings.sent4: The belemnites fossil was a snapshot of prehistoric times.
meanings.sent5: The belemnites fossil gleamed under the museum lights.

meanings.definition: Belemnites: resembling or related to belemnites.
meanings.sent1: The belemnites-like shape of the toy fascinated the child.
meanings.sent2: The belemnites pattern on the fabric reminded her of the sea.
meanings.sent3: His belemnites socks always made people smile.
meanings.sent4: The belemnites design on the necklace was elegant and unique.
meanings.sent5: The belemnites color of the car made it stand out on the road.
